content.body: Jesse, can you make the polyfill available someplace like https://tc39.es/proposal-amount/docs/ so that people can use it in the web inspector like they can with the Temporal polyfill?
content.formatted_body: Jesse, can you make the polyfill available someplace like https://tc39.es/proposal-amount/docs/ so that people can use it in the web inspector like they can with the Temporal polyfill?
